about.title: About me:
about.intro: Hi, I'm Oussama Fannah, a Full Stack Web Developer . I'm passionate about technology and skilled in JavaScript, React, Node.js, and more.
about.secondLine: With a strong foundation and a drive for continuous learning, I'm eager to embrace new challenges and contribute to innovative projects in the tech industry.
